            <tei-zone points="1425,2086 1358,2135 1261,2161 1341,2197 1497,2221 1540,2257 1540,2474 369,2486 351,2456 345,2179 422,2161 454,2123 442,2033 390,2019 1431,2019" id="eSc_textblock_6f563b09" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>

    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_3d042e1f" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Welte's<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Wonder<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Invention</tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_3b2e08a4" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Welte's Orchestrion</tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_08bba70b" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_e806de79" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_2545edc4" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_090e558e" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>

        <tei-pb data-origname="pb" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_1211376e" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-persName data-origname="persName">Michael Welte</tei-persName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The Clockmaker of Freiburg
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_e5a2870f" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>To <tei-persName data-origname="persName">Michael Welte</tei-persName>,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the chiming clock-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>maker of a dreamy
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>hamlet in Germany,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>belongs the distinction
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of conceiving and build-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ing an instrument that would reproduce the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>actual playing of a great pianist.
            <tei-seg ana="#technical_invention" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Though a clock-maker by trade, Welte
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>was given to study and invention
            </tei-seg>
            and being
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>called on to design a musical chime for a
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_f0769516" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>clock, he conceived the idea of having the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>chimes play a tune.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>On the
            accuracy and novelty of his chim-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ing clocks, <tei-persName data-origname="persName">Michael Welte</tei-persName>, in 1832, found
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the firm of <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">M. Welte & Sons</tei-orgName>, a venerable in-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>stitution now located at <tei-placeName data-origname="placeName">Freiburg, Germany</tei-placeName>.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The years elapsed and Welte's clocks
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>chimed the passage of the hours from man-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>tles in every nook of Europe, while the firm
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>that had begun so humbly had acquired a
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>continental prestige.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_07d9cc5e" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>In 1849, after three years of patient toil,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-persName data-origname="persName">Michael Welte</tei-persName> brought fourth his first Orches-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>trion, the clumsy forerunner of the marvelous
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Philharmonic Organs of the present day.
            <tei-quote data-origname="quote">
                "It
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>was a wonder of mechanical perfection, con-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>taining eleven hundred pipes, that were
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>brought to playing by thousands of small
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>pins, representing the harmonies and melo-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>dies of musical compositions thus 'written'
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>on three large wooden cylinders, that moved
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>with a startling precision as had been thought
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>impossible before."
            </tei-quote>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#technical_invention" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                Many years before <tei-persName data-origname="persName">Edison</tei-persName> dreamed his
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>thrilling dream of the phonograph the fame
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of Welte's new invention had traveled
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>through all Europe
            </tei-seg> and soon the business of
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>chiming clocks gave way to the making of
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>mechanically operated musical instruments.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Dukes and statesmen, musicians of low rank
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>and high rank, came from afar to listen and
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>marvel at <tei-persName data-origname="persName">Michael Welte's</tei-persName> astounding crea-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>tion. The firm expanded and the business of
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">M. Welte & Sons</tei-orgName> attained large proportions.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>In 1865, <tei-persName data-origname="persName">Emil Welte</tei-persName>, a son of the founder,
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_d9110567" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Welte's Wonder Invention
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_9e212c90" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>came to America where success was instan-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>taneous. The demand for Welte's Orches-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>trions, coming now from two hemispheres, led,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>in 1872, to the removal to Freiburg, which
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>thus became the musical shrine of Europe.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Eight years later <tei-persName data-origname="persName">Michael Welte</tei-persName>, the clock-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>maker closed his eyes forever, leaving his
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>sons endowed with his own inventive genius
            <tei-seg ana="#technical_invention" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>In 1887, <tei-persName data-origname="persName">Emil Welte</tei-persName>
                startled the world by the
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>invention of a paper music-roll in connection
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>with a pneumatic action,
            </tei-seg>
            thus eliminating
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the bulky wooden cylinders and giving the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>instrument an unlimited repertoire.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_985e1b6b" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_6dbc318f" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_29cfa920" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_6286a23c" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>

        <tei-pb data-origname="pb" data-empty=""/>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_fd6fe9ba" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                    A woman and a man sitting, listening to
                    a Welte Grand.
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-figure>
            <tei-p data-origname="p">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Welte's Dream of Living Music -- A Reality
            </tei-p>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_afba7f08" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>It was only natural that the artistic develop-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ment of Welte Orchestrions and Philhar-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>monic Organs should have led the thoughts
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of the Weltes onward and upward to the idea
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of recording the playing of the musician
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>and applying to the piano a new principle
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>-that of reproducing the artist's playng
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>by means of an automatic instrument.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Thus was conceived <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name>* (pro-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>nounce Well-tee Mee-yon) or "Little
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Welte," as it was designated to distinguish
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>it from the large instruments on which
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_d1c98342" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the Welte reputation and business had been
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>established.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Thus <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">M. Welte & Sons</tei-orgName> were origina-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>tors of the idea of reproducing the playing of
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>pianists, and were granted the original, basic
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>patents on reproducing mechanisms now em-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ployed in the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon* Reproducing
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Action</tei-name> manufactured by the <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Auto Pneumatic
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Action Company</tei-orgName>, under a license granting
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the unrestricted use of these patents in manu-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>facturing reproducing actions for the piano
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>industry.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_1a73062e" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#exact_reproduction #secret" type="topic" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">
                Perfect Reproducing â The Secret of Welte Mignon
            </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_38047c95" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-seg ana="#analogy_to_photography" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> method of recording
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>a player's performance is photographic.
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Through this
                <tei-seg ana="#secret" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    secret photographic process
                </tei-seg>-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>possessed only by <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon,*</tei-name> available
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>only to <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon*</tei-name> - the artist's play-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ing is actually photographed â his tempo, his
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>speaking notes, his dynamics,
                <tei-seg ana="#soulfulness" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    those subtle
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>things that infuse an artist's very soul into
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>his playing.
                </tei-seg>
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>These photographs show precisely the pres-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>sure with which the artist strikes the keys,
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>whether ever so lightly-pianissimo-or with
            </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_f403edec" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the vigor of fortissimo.
            <tei-seg ana="#analogy_to_photography" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                And this photo-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>graphic record is so perfectâso identically
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the physical impression of the master's per-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>formance,
            </tei-seg>
            that he is never called upon to edit
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>or arrange the recording. Thus, editing the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>recording of a great pianist is not necessary
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>with <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon*</tei-name> and only with <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Mignon</tei-name> is it not necessary.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Herein lies the vast difference between
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon*</tei-name> recordings of great pianists
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>and those of all other reproducing mechan-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>isms.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_688779c3" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The World's Greatest Pianists record for <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon*</tei-name>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_cec6b76a" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Many musicians and masters whose names
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>gleam like stars in the firmament of music
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>have paid glowing tribute to <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mig-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>non.*</tei-name> From every corner of the world come
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>musicians to inscribe their matchless art on
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the imperishable pages of <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon's*</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ever-growing library of music.
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/116014490" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">
                De Pach-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>mann
            </tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118986724" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Paderewski</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/116204400" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Bloomfield-Zeisler</tei-persName>,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-persName type="artist" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type">Levy</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type">Singer</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/134788370" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Pouishnoff</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118694820" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Gieseking</tei-persName>,<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-persName type="artist" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type">Liebling</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type">Saar</tei-persName> and
            <tei-persName type="artist" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type">Boguslawski</tei-persName>
            are but
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>*Licensed under original <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> patents
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_f606c738" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>a few of the great artists whose playing you
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>may hear on <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon.*</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The famed <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon* Library</tei-name> of in-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>terpreted music is without a doubt the most
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>comprehensive in the world of music, con-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>taining more than two thousand selections,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>embracing practically every musical compo-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>sition through which the master composers
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of the past two centuries have immortalized
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>themselves.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_6e2c7c1b" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>

        <tei-pb data-origname="pb" data-empty=""/>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_36a1467b" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-seg ana="#phantom_body" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                    <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                        Semi-transparent pianist sitting at an opened
                        Welte Grand.
                    </tei-desc>
                </tei-figure>
                <tei-p data-origname="p">
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>phantom hands of the Masters on your keyboard
                </tei-p>
            </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_10ec60b1" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-seg ana="#phantom_body" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte Mignon</tei-name> Puts the Phantom-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Hands of the Masters on your keyboard
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon*</tei-name> brings you living
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>music. <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon*</tei-name> makes hu-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>man the mechanical reproduction of
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>music.
            <tei-seg ana="#soulfulness #personality" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                It supplies the soul and the
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>personality which the individual art-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ist puts into his playing.
            </tei-seg>
            No one sits
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>at the piano.
            <tei-seg ana="#phantom_body" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                Only the phantom<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>hands of the masters touch the keys
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-seg ana="#listening" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>-and you listen to the music as
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>masters play it-rhythm, tone, col-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>or, quality, individuality. Just lis-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ten!
            </tei-seg>
            You will be amazed and con-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>vinced because the spirit of <tei-persName data-origname="persName">Michael
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Welte</tei-persName>, thing chiming clock-maker of
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-placeName data-origname="placeName">Freiburg</tei-placeName> lives in every <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Mignon Reproducing Action</tei-name>.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte Mignon*</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The Reproducing Piano
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>With the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon* Re-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>producing Piano</tei-name>-i.e., any piano
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>*Licensed under original <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> patents
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_e780b0b2" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>equipped with the marvelous <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Mignon Licensee Action</tei-name> - a selec-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>tion is played for you
            <tei-seg ana="#virtual_presence" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                with all the
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>skill, warmth and color, and all the
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>delicate shades of tone as though
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the pianist were seated at your piano
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>in person.
            </tei-seg> In this respect the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Mignon Reproducing Piano</tei-name> stands
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>supreme. It has no peer. It is per-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>fection.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>112 reasons why you should select
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>a piano equipped with the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte Mignon*
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Reproducing Action</tei-name>,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Select a <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon* Repro-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ducing Piano</tei-name> first of all because it
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>embodies the genius of <tei-persName data-origname="persName">Michael
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Welte</tei-persName>, and then, again, select it be-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>cause 112 of America's most promi-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>nent piano manufacturers have se-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>lected <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon*</tei-name> as the only
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>reproducing action for their piano.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>This fact in itself is ample testimony,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of the greatness of <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon.*</tei-name>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_6f563b09" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Auto Pneumatic Action Co.</tei-orgName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-address data-origname="address">
                653 West 51s St., New York
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>W.C. Heaton, Pres.
            </tei-address>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">
                Welte-Mignon
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Licensee
            </tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-seg type="slogan" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type">The Master's Fingers on your piano.</tei-seg>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_ea26bdd7" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                    Portraits of pianists.
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-figure>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_f3b7a1f1" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_a3cd0458" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
